item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 20th December
item.description:
Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection. Two bags, one containing general litter and the other cans/plastic bottles for recycling. Also one nitrous oxide cylinder. Bags left next to litter bin 0230. Cheltenham Road/Nine Elms Road Junction bus stop, Longlevens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Several Potholes outside 4/5 Newdawn Place, 20th December
item.description:
A number of potholes all along Village Road. These in particular are creating large puddles that are splashing pedestrians and causing cars/buses to swerve onto the other side of the road. Debris from the road is now all over the pavement and causing people to slip on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105, Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water emerging from drain implying blockage in pipework, 20th December
item.description:
The drain opposite Pirton House has water draining OUT of the drain. It then runs downhill over two further apparently blocked drainage grids before finally draining into the third by the railway bridge, although this is also overloaded in heavy rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: An area about 6 foot long creating multiple potholes getting bigger every day. Very dangerous cannot avoid them unless you pull into opposite side of the road., 20th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
